meanings.definition: The condition of having the ovary situated below the other floral parts.
meanings.sent1: In hypogynies, the ovary is positioned beneath the petals.
meanings.sent2: The hypogynies of the flower make it unique in structure.
meanings.sent3: The hypogynies of the plant confused the botanist, making them laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a canvas of hypogynies, with the ovaries like hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The hypogynies of the flower stood out, like a secret waiting to be discovered.
